knimeNode.name: FSK to metadata
knimeNode.shortDescription: Extract metadata from an FSK object

intro.p: Extracts the metadata in an FSK object to a KNIME JSON table with the four metadata elements defined in RAKIP for every model: general information, scope, data background and model math.

The metadata is configured into separate JSON columns with each element. These columns contain JSON objects that can be further processed with KNIME JSON nodes. This table only describes the metadata of one model and then only needs one row.
